review: Excellent and very experienced doctor. Patient and explained the treatment choice well. Definitely recommend.
Doctor was thorough in his examination. Diagnosis was spot on.  He recommended physiotherapy and no extra medication. All in all, a very good experience.

Visited Dr. Subodh for my mother's hand fracture. It was an emergecy however, doctor explained the issue very calmly. Suggested to unergo surgery which he lead very smoothly. He was absolutely attentive to patient's wellbeing. We were also impressed with the suport we received from his staff at his clinic, Ishaan orthopedic center.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Doctor is not only friendly but has the patient to listen to the concern of patients.
His diagnosis is also very precise. This is our second experience with Dr.
My sister too was treated with precision and she is very fine now and relieved of pain and ailment.
Thank you Dr. Be blessed.
